gen:link.msg:message: `CentralGovernmentContributionsMinusWorkplaceFunction` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCentralGovernmentContributionsBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_CentralGovernmentContributionsMinusWorkplaceFunction')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCentralGovernmentContributionsBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_CentralGovernmentContributionsMinusWorkplaceFunction return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCentralGovernmentContributionsBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfCentralGovernmentContributionsMinusWorkplaceFunctionCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCentralGovernmentContributionsBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfCentralGovernmentContributionsMinusWorkplaceFunctionCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCentralGovernmentContributionsBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfCentralGovernmentContributionsMinusWorkplaceFunctionDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCentralGovernmentContributionsBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfCentralGovernmentContributionsMinusWorkplaceFunctionDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
